nodes.text: Carpo spice was a type of spice distributed on the Core Worlds planet Lanz Carpo by Boss Carpo and his crime syndicate. When Han Solo was sent with Leia Organa on a mission to Lanz Carpo for the Rebel Alliance, he considered trying some Carpo spice. Solo was eventually captured by Boss Carpo, and when the crime lord let him go free in exchange for the rebels eliminating the regional Imperial governor, who Carpo believed was out to attack him, Solo was given a crate of Carpo spice.
